General.Name: Hangzhou Electn Soul Network
General.Description: Hangzhou Electronic Soul Network Technology Co., Ltd., develops and publishes online and mobile games in Asia. It offers H5 games, VR games, consoles, stand-alone games, and apps platforms, as well as comics and e-sports events. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Fang  Chen
1.Title: Deputy GM, Director of Investment Management Department & Director
